comments.body: Digaran, assume I haven't read any other posts today.Â  What in the world are you talking about, specifically?Â  Because even though I assume you're referring to something about the mixer news I haven't a clue as to exactly what you're getting at.Â  Don't be vague, even if you're trolling/being a comedian/whatever.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on December 01, 2023, 05:27:11 PMDigaran, assume I haven't read any other posts today.Â  What in the world are you talking about, specifically?Â  What he is saying is that theymos should have waited till there is clear regulation for mixers before banning mixers campaign on this forum.I am not saying I am in support of what digaran said but just saying what he is talking about.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Well, sometimes, it's better to disallow something from getting close, than allowing it get close, then you start looking for how to hide and save yourself.It is like the doctors saying that, preventing yourself from catching cold is better than finding a cure for it when you allow yourself to catch.Even though I believe the government knows that this forum exists, for they must have studied bitcoin and discover that it all began from here, it's better to know what is right to do than wait until the government start sending letters, that could mean looking for trouble, and you never know the trouble that you end up not being able to come out from, do better to avoid them all.
